checks.title: Persistent URL
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology has a persistent URL (w3id, purl, DOI, or a W3C URL)

checks.title: RDF Availability
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology has an RDF serialization (ttl, n3, rdf/xml, json-ld)

checks.title: Minimum metadata
checks.explanation: The following metadata was not found: author
checks.description: This check verifies if the The following  minimum metadata [title, description, license, version iri, creator, creationDate, namespace URI] are present in the ontology

checks.title: Recommended metadata
checks.explanation: The following metadata was not found: citation. Warning: The following OPTIONAL recommended metadata could not be found: contributor. Please consider adding them if appropriate.
checks.description: This check verifies if the following recommended metadata [NS Prefix, version info, creation date, citation] are present in the ontology. It also checks if [contributor] is present, but with no penalty (as no all ontologies may have a contributor)

checks.title: Detailed metadata
checks.explanation: The following metadata was not found: doi, publisher, logo, status, issued. Warning: The following OPTIONAL detailed metadata could not be found: previous version, backwards compatibility, modified. Please consider adding them if appropriate.
checks.description: This check verifies if the following detailed metadata [doi, publisher, logo, status, source, issued date] are present in the ontology. It also checks if [previous version, backward compatibility, modified] are present, but with no penalty (as no all ontologies may have, e.g., a previous version)

checks.title: License availability
checks.description: This check verifies if a license associated with the ontology

checks.title: License is resolvable
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology license is resolvable

checks.title: Basic provenance metadata
checks.explanation: The following provenance information was not found: author. Warning: The following OPTIONAL provenance metadata could not be found: contributor, previous version. Please consider adding them if appropriate.
checks.description: This check verifies if basic provenance is available for the ontology: [author, creation date]. This check also verifies whether [contributor, previous version] are present, but with no penalty (as no all ontologies may have a previous version or a contributor)

checks.title: Detailed provenance metadata
checks.explanation: The following provenance information was not found: issued, publisher
checks.description: This check verifies if detailed provenance information is available for the ontology: [issued date, publisher]

checks.title: Ontology prefix
checks.explanation: Prefix declaration found in the ontology: ys
checks.description: This check verifies if an ontology prefix is available

checks.title: Vocabulary reuse (metadata)
checks.explanation: Ontology reuses existing vocabularies for declaring metadata.
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology reuses other vocabularies for declaring metadata terms

checks.title: Vocabulary reuse
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology imports/extends other vocabularies (besides RDF, OWL and RDFS)

checks.title: Documentation: labels
checks.explanation: Labels found for all ontology terms
checks.description: This check verifies the extent to which all ontology terms have labels (rdfs:label in OWL vocabularies, skos:prefLabel in SKOS vocabularies)

checks.title: Documentation: definitions
checks.explanation: Descriptions found for all ontology terms
checks.description: This check verifies whether all ontology terms have descriptions (rdfs:comment in OWL vocabularies, skos:definition in SKOS vocabularies)

checks.title: Version IRI
checks.explanation: Version IRI  defined but equal to ontology id
checks.description: This check verifies if there is an id for this ontology version, and whether the id is unique (i.e., different from the ontology URI)
